backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - Real API calls
original_prompt: Help me set the agenda to review the progress of Project Alpha with the product and marketing team to get confirmation we are on track and discuss any blocking issues or risks.

gutts.name: Extract Meeting Purpose
gutts.capability: Identify and extract the main purpose of the meeting from the user prompt
gutts.user_goal: Clarify why the meeting is being scheduled
gutts.evidence: Extracted purpose: 'Review the progress of Project Alpha'

gutts.name: Identify Project Name
gutts.capability: Detect and extract the project name mentioned in the prompt
gutts.user_goal: Know which project the agenda relates to

gutts.name: Identify Participants by Role
gutts.capability: Extract participant roles or teams from the prompt
gutts.user_goal: Determine which teams or roles should attend

gutts.name: Map Roles to Actual Attendees
gutts.capability: Resolve roles or teams to actual user contacts or calendar entities
gutts.evidence: Mapped 'product team' to Alice and Bob; 'marketing team' to Carol

gutts.name: Extract Confirmation Objective
gutts.capability: Identify that the meeting aims to confirm the project is on track
gutts.evidence: Objective: 'Get confirmation we are on track'

gutts.name: Extract Discussion Topics
gutts.capability: Identify specific discussion points such as blocking issues or risks
gutts.user_goal: List all topics to include in the agenda
gutts.evidence: Topics: 'Discuss any blocking issues or risks'

gutts.name: Generate Agenda Items
gutts.capability: Convert extracted objectives and topics into structured agenda items
gutts.user_goal: Create a clear agenda outline for the meeting
gutts.evidence: Agenda: 1) Review Project Alpha progress, 2) Confirm on-track status, 3) Discuss blocking issues and risks

gutts.name: Determine Meeting Duration
gutts.capability: Estimate appropriate meeting length based on agenda complexity
gutts.user_goal: Allocate sufficient time for all agenda items

gutts.name: Propose Meeting Time
gutts.capability: Suggest a suitable meeting time based on participants' availability
gutts.user_goal: Find a time that works for all attendees

gutts.name: Create Calendar Event
gutts.capability: Generate a calendar event with title, agenda, participants, and time
gutts.user_goal: Schedule the meeting in the calendar
gutts.evidence: Event created: 'Project Alpha Progress Review' with agenda and attendees

gutts.name: Send Meeting Invitations
gutts.capability: Dispatch invitations to all identified attendees
gutts.evidence: Invitations sent to Alice, Bob, and Carol
